title: Finance_360
description: Financial data platform aggregating information from various sources for a comprehensive view of finances.

account_information.title: Account Information
account_information.description: Detailed information about financial accounts, including balances, transactions, and account types.

workflow.title: Account Information Workflow
workflow.description: Automated pipeline for ingesting, processing, and analyzing account information data.

transaction_history.title: Transaction History
transaction_history.description: Detailed transaction history including date, amount, type, and category.

workflow.title: Transaction History Workflow
workflow.description: Automated pipeline for ingesting, processing, and analyzing transaction history data.

investment_portfolio.title: Investment Portfolio
investment_portfolio.description: Overview of investment portfolio including holdings, asset allocation, and performance.

workflow.title: Investment Portfolio Workflow
workflow.description: Automated pipeline for ingesting, processing, and analyzing investment portfolio data.

lens.name: Finance Insights Lens
lens.description: Provides insights into financial behavior, investment trends, and portfolio performance.

Compute_Cluster.Title: Compute Cluster
Compute_Cluster.Description: Utilized for large-scale data processing and analysis.

Details.Node_Type: Instance type with high CPU and RAM

Streaming_Cluster.Title: Streaming Cluster
Streaming_Cluster.Description: Used for real-time data processing and streaming analytics.

Details.Broker_Instance_Type: Instance type optimized for streaming workloads

Database_Storage.Title: Database Storage
Database_Storage.Description: Utilized for storing enriched and processed data.

Python.Title: Python
Python.Description: For data processing, analysis, and modeling tasks.

SQL.Title: SQL
SQL.Description: For querying and managing relational databases.

Power_BI.Title: Power BI
Power_BI.Description: For creating interactive visualizations and reports.

TechnicalSpecifications.Title: Finance 360 Lens
TechnicalSpecifications.Description: Empowers users with comprehensive insights into financial data.

Features.Real-time Monitoring: Monitor financial transactions and account activities in real-time.
Features.Portfolio Analysis: Analyze investment portfolio performance and asset allocation.
Features.Transaction Trends: Identify patterns and trends in transaction history for actionable insights.

GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Title: Governance Policies and Stewardship
GovernancePoliciesAndStewardship.Description: Establishing policies and roles for effective data governance and stewardship.

AccessControl.RoleBasedAccess: Granting access based on roles to maintain data security.
AccessControl.DiscretionaryAccess: Implementing discretionary access control and encryption for sensitive data.

StewardResponsibilities.Title: Steward Responsibilities
StewardResponsibilities.Description: Defining roles and responsibilities for data ownership and stewardship.

DataQualityAndGovernance.Title: Data Quality Management
DataQualityAndGovernance.Description: Ensuring high-quality data through rigorous measures and adherence to standards.
DataQualityAndGovernance.Approach: Comprehensive assessment across dimensions such as accuracy, completeness, timeliness, consistency, and reliability.
DataQualityAndGovernance.AuditsAndFeedback: Regular audits and feedback mechanisms to continuously enhance data quality and integrity.

CleansingAndPreprocessing.Title: Data Cleansing and Preprocessing
CleansingAndPreprocessing.Description: Thorough cleaning and preprocessing procedures to ensure data accuracy and consistency.

FinancialAnalysis.Title: Expense Tracking
FinancialAnalysis.Description: Analyze spending patterns and track expenses over time for budgeting and financial planning.

FinancialAnalysis.Title: Risk Assessment
FinancialAnalysis.Description: Assess investment risks and identify potential opportunities for optimizing portfolio performance.

FinancialAnalysis.Title: Fraud Detection
FinancialAnalysis.Description: Leverage transaction analytics to detect and prevent fraudulent activities in real-time.

FinancialAnalysis.Title: Customer Segmentation
FinancialAnalysis.Description: Segment customers based on financial behavior and preferences for targeted marketing and personalized services.
